roguelike.name: Roguelike Game
roguelike.description: An in-browser game in which players explore the 'hospital', clean messes, and defeat the boss!

google-clone.name: Google Clone
google-clone.description: A clone of the Google homepage, with some added 'functionality'.

android-logo.name: CSS Android
android-logo.description: An Android logo with custom animations.

calculator.name: Simple Calculator
calculator.description: A JavaScript calculator with background changes based on time of day.

game-of-life.name: Game of Life
game-of-life.description: A React implementation of Conway's Game of Life.

heat-map.name: Literal Heat Map
heat-map.description: A visual representation of global monthly temperatures from 1753 to 2015.

simon-game.name: Simon Game
simon-game.description: An in-browser version of the classic kid's game, with requisite 80's nostalgia.

weather-app.name: Happy Weather
weather-app.description: A weather app that loads current weather and imagery based on the user's location and time of day.
